entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
